1. When was the Babylonian Empire?: 5. If a son hit his father, what would his punishment be under Hammurabi’s Code?
His hands would be chopped off.

1. When was the Babylonian Empire?: 6. What were some reasons Hammurabi’s Code was important?
a. It was written b. It was publicly displayed Because of these two facts, everyone had to follow the Code, and the leaders couldn’t change the law whenever they wanted to.
